src.game
Class Battles

java.lang.Object
  src.game.Battles

public class Battles
extends java.lang.Object

This class will control fighting between 2 people in the world. There are a number of fight methods set up. Each fight method takes 2 parameters, the player/enemy that is attacking, and the player/enemy that is being attacked. The aggressor player/enemy is always the first parameter.

Author:
Darren Watts date 11/11/07

fight

public static void fight(Player plr,
                         Enemy enemy)
                  throws EnemyDiedException
The fight method for a player attacking an enemy.

Parameters:
plr - Player : The player that is attacking
enemy - Enemy : The enemy that is being attacked.
Throws:
EnemyDiedException

modifyBaseDamage

private static int modifyBaseDamage(int baseDamage,
                                    Player plr,
                                    Enemy enemy)
Checks to see if the player deals a critical hit or stuns the enemy. If a critical hit is dealt, it will return the modified damage amount. If the enemy is stunned, it will set the enemy's stunned variable and return the normal damage amount. If nothing happens, it will just return the regular damage amount given.

Parameters:
baseDamage - int : base damage
plr - Player : the player dealing damage
enemy - Enemy : the enemy taking damage
Returns:
int : damage amount

getDamage

private static int getDamage(Player plr,
                             Enemy enemy)
Calculates the damage based on the player's attacking damage type and the enemy's armor.

Parameters:
plr - Player : the player that is attacking
enemy - Enemy : the enemy that is being attacked
Returns:
int : damage amount

hitTarget

getPlrAbil

private static int getPlrAbil(Enemy enemy,
                              Player plr)
Gets the player's ability based on the type of weapon the enemy is using. So, if the enemy is using a melee weapon, it will return the fighting ability of the player. If the enemy's weapon is martial arts, it will return the martial arts ability of the player.

Parameters:
enemy - Enemy : the attacking enemy
plr - Player : the player
Returns:
int : player's ability

hitTarget

private static boolean hitTarget(Enemy enemy,
                                 Player plr)
Checks to see whether or not the enemy successfully hits the player.

Parameters:
enemy - Enemy : the enemy that is attacking
plr - Player : the player that is being attacked
Returns:
boolean : hit target

checkForAmmo

private static boolean checkForAmmo(Player plr)
Checks to see which type of weapon the player is using, and makes sure the palyer has enough ammo to use it. If the player is out of ammo, it will print a message to the messages window and will return false.

Returns:
boolean : has ammo
